Here are some cheap-but-not-crazy VPS offers in the UK. We use AS200039, with DDoS protection through Voxility up to and over 100Gbps. Always on protection and layer 7 protection can be turned on/off by request, but we cannot add custom filters. No SLA guarantee on these offers, but if a node goes down due to an unplanned or unexplained event all VPS's affected get a free month of service :)

As this is a DDoS protected offer, there will be times that attacks will filter through and cause packet loss. This offer is not suitable for running anything that requires a permanent connection such as IRC, due to the shared nature of the DDoS protection. Thank you for your understanding! If you are looking for a VPS on better hardware and with higher capacity ddos protection, check out @Zare directly.

If this offer does not work out, you will be migrated to an alternate datacenter in the UK while keeping the same IP or a refund given.
